description: This file contains custom CSS variables and styles for a tic-tac-toe game application, including theming, layout, and styling for buttons and game components.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button that allows users to switch between light and dark themes.

classes.name: ttt-container
classes.description: Main container layout styles for the tic-tac-toe game.

classes.name: ttt-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the tic-tac-toe game.

classes.name: ttt-main
classes.description: Styles for the main game area that organizes the board and controls.

classes.name: ttt-game
classes.description: Styles for the game panel containing the grid and user controls.

classes.name: ttt-board
classes.description: Styles for the tic-tac-toe game board layout.

classes.name: ttt-square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares on the tic-tac-toe board.

classes.name: ttt-status
classes.description: Styles for displaying game status information.

classes.name: ttt-reset
classes.description: Styles for the reset button used to restart the game.

classes.name: ttt-history-panel
classes.description: Styles for the history panel that shows past game results.

classes.name: ttt-footer
classes.description: Styles for the footer section of the tic-tac-toe game.
